title: Hour 3 - Aaron Gordon (07-23-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Aaron Gordon (07-23-20)
description:
Orlando Magic forward Aaron Gordon joins the program to discuss how it's odd living in the NBA bubble when his home is less than 15 minutes away. Also, "The Red Baron"--Rick Sutcliffe, former MLB pitcher and current MLB analyst, swings by to share his thoughts on the long-awaited Opening Day for Major League Baseball.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
